original: Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava
